original_text: In thee have they discovered their fathers' nakedness: in thee have they humbled her that was set apart for pollution.
korean_text: 네 가운데에 자기 아버지의 하체를 드러내는 자도 있었으며 네 가운데에 월경하는 부정한 여인과 관계하는 자도 있었으며

sentences.original_text: In thee have they discovered their fathers' nakedness:
sentences.korean_translation: 네 안에서 그들은 아버지들의 수치를 드러냈도다

sentences.original_text: in thee have they humbled her
that was set apart for pollution.
